parameters.name: BannedAll
parameters.description: Specifies whether to mute all users.

parameters.name: BannnedUsers
parameters.description: The ID of the user whom you want to mute. Separate multiple user IDs with commas (,). You can specify up to 30 users IDs.

parameters.name: DataCenter
parameters.description: The data center. It must be the same as the data center that was specified when you called the [CreateLiveMessageApp](~~2848162~~) operation to create the interactive messaging application. Valid values: cn-shanghai and ap-southeast-1 (Singapore).

parameters.name: ExceptUsers
parameters.description: The ID of the user whom you do not want to mute when you set the BannedAll parameter to true. Separate multiple user IDs with commas (,). You can specify up to 30 users IDs.
